about.summary: Earth Engine <https://earthengine.google.com/> client library for R. All of the 'Earth Engine' API classes, modules, and functions are made available. Additional functions implemented include importing (exporting) of Earth Engine spatial objects, extraction of time series, interactive map display, assets management interface, and metadata display. See <https://r-spatial.github.io/rgee/> for further details.

Earth Engine <https://earthengine.google.com/> client library for R. All of the 'Earth Engine' API classes, modules, and functions are made available. Additional functions implemented include importing (exporting) of Earth Engine spatial objects, extraction of time series, interactive map display, assets management interface, and metadata display. See <https://r-spatial.github.io/rgee/> for further details.

name: r-rgee
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.1.8" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-rgee
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/rgee_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/rgee/rgee_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 483e0e898be52512ba925562d4a7d146afbfb0143f958d67e092fbd270f1dfa6

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-r6
    - r-cli
    - r-crayon
    - r-jsonlite
    - r-leafem
    - r-leaflet >=2.0.2
    - r-magrittr
    - r-processx
    - r-reticulate >=1.24
    - r-rstudioapi >=0.7
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-r6
    - r-cli
    - r-crayon
    - r-jsonlite
    - r-leafem
    - r-leaflet >=2.0.2
    - r-magrittr
    - r-processx
    - r-reticulate >=1.24
    - r-rstudioapi >=0.7

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('rgee')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('rgee')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/r-spatial/rgee/, https://r-spatial.github.io/rgee/, https://github.com/google/earthengine-api/
  license: Apache-2.0
  summary: Earth Engine <https://earthengine.google.com/> client library for R. All of the 'Earth Engine' API classes, modules, and functions are made available. Additional functions implemented include importing (exporting) of Earth Engine spatial objects, extraction of time series, interactive map display, assets management
    interface, and metadata display. See <https://r-spatial.github.io/rgee/> for further details.
  license_family: APACHE
  license_file:
    - LICENSE.md

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - csaybar
    - davemlz

# Description: Earth Engine <https://earthengine.google.com/> client library for R. All of the 'Earth Engine' API classes, modules, and functions are made available. Additional functions implemented include importing (exporting) of Earth Engine spatial objects, extraction of time series, interactive map display, assets management interface, and metadata display. See <https://r-spatial.github.io/rgee/> for further details.
